title: Joe asks librarian direct to section to find book

content.question: When Joe arrives at the library, he can choose from any of several strategies that might help him find the book he needs. He could examine all the books on every shelf, and be certain that he would eventually find the book he wants, but this strategy would take too long. Joe decides instead to ask a librarian to direct him to the appropriate section of the library. Joe is using

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
